trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bloomer
There was one other sighting in Bloomer on or around October 31st 1996
divs: Sighting DetailsA woman attending the restroom late at night observed a hovering disc over treesin the near distance. The object had a ring of white lights at the top andbottom and red lights around the middle. The object approached slowly. The womanraced to lock doors, but a force pushed open the kitchen door. A mist or fog anda long skinny hand at childs height came through the opening. A telepathicmessage scolded her for resisting. After a time lapse, she awoke in her bed.
Summary: Entity forcibly entered home; possible abduction.
